article.title: Kennedy Assigned to Office of the Secretary of the Air Force

tags.tag: Office of the Secretary of the Air Force

article.text: Col. Kevin B. Kennedy, USAF, has been selected for the grade of brigadier general and assigned as director, warfighter systems and cyberspace integration, Office of Chief, Information Dominance, and chief information officer, Office of the Secretary of the Air Force, Pentagon, Washington, District of Columbia.
